thread.title: Nod and Smile: The Struggles of a Language Student Abroad
thread.title_full: Nod and Smile: The Struggles of a Language Student Abroad

title: Nod and Smile: The Struggles of a Language Student Abroad
text:
Published By: Huffington Post College - Today 
Near my house, there is an Italian coffee shop run by Romans. At least, I think they're Romans. I go there every day for my morning cappucci...
